Beachcomber Island Resort Welcome to the iconic Beachcomber Island Resort- Fiji's authentic island experience! Beachcomber is the island of your tropical fantasies- where pure white sand meets a crystal clear and always warm ocean. Where coconut palms line the shore with hammocks for lazing away the afternoon while watching the sun set over the water. And where you can snorkel over the fish and turtles feeding on the pristine coral reef of our marine sanctuary encasing the entire island.
